xwikidoc.content:
This the **Wiki Chat Prototype**. It embeds an XMPP server provide a chat system.
In the bottom of every page you will have a chat bar with different tabs. They represents the chat rooms where you are currently connected.
There is a global chatroom for the Wiki, one for the current space, and one for the current page.
You can also connect from external XMPP clients (e.g. [[Pidgin>>http://www.pidgin.im/]]). Just setup an XMPP account, point it to your XWiki server host and use your standard XWiki username and password to login.
You can see a video of how it works here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0Gwtpu3iVwo.
{{info}} **This is a prototype and a work in progress. There are a lot of limitations. Please refer to https://github.com/xwiki-contrib/xwiki-platform-chat for more information.** {{/info}}
